column2:
```r
library('fossil')
clusters = grep('k4', names(melanomaSTList@st_clusters$clust_dfs), value=T)
randidx_df = tibble::tibble(cluster=as.character(), rand=as.numeric())
for(i in clusters){
  rand_i = fossil::rand.index(as.numeric(Seuratclusters_df$seurat_clusters), 
                              as.numeric(melanomaSTList@st_clusters$clust_dfs[[i]]$WCluster))
  randidx_df = dplyr::bind_rows(randidx_df, list(cluster=i, rand=rand_i))
}
```
